snippet: After the destruction of Hurricane Sandy, city, state and federal officials should need no further reminders about the needs of the region’s transit system.
abstract: Editorial contends New York and federal officials should need no further reminders about financing needs of Metropolitan Transportation Authority in wake of Hurricane Sandy; calls on leaders at all levels to secure better funding for system.
lead_paragraph: After the destruction of Hurricane Sandy, city, state and federal officials should need no further reminders about the needs of the region’s transit system.
